name: XWUI Item Component
description: Flexible item component that converts JSON configuration into HTML. Supports multiple content sections (primary, secondary, tertiary, avatar), various item types (card, row, banner, search, chat_bubble), sizes, status indicators, and interactive features. This is a foundational component used by many other XWUI components.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the item

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component. This should be an ItemConfig object following the XWUIItem schema.
Item configuration object (see XWUIItem.schema.json for full structure)
